title: Memories of Summer '06
name: Memories of Summer '06
description:
A Map by Mbeecrof

This maps out the places I frequently hung out at with my high school friends the summer right before we went off to our first year of college.

properties.name: G.J.'s house
properties.description: Posted by MbeecrofMy boyfriend\'s house was here. I\'d come here often to hang out with him. He has since moved however, which is quite sad.

properties.name: Grassland Playground
properties.description: Posted by Mbeecrof  A variety of things were done at this location. Including frisbee, playing on the playground, star gazing, smoking, four wheeling and a few other possibly illegal activities such as flamming tennis, shooting off fireworks, and putting cafeteria trays under the wheels of our cars and driving around in the parking lot.

properties.name: Jeff's house
properties.description: Posted by MbeecrofA friend\'s house we would come to at night and sit around a fire in his back yard and tell scary stories and star gaze.

properties.name: Kaylyn's house
properties.description: Posted by MbeecrofOne of my best friends from high school lives in this area. This is probably the first place I think of when I think of summer \'06. We\'d come here countless nights and sit on her back porch to smoke and talk, or go to her tennis courts and star gaze.

properties.name: Red Caboose Park
properties.description: Posted by MbeecrofA great place for Hide and Seek.

properties.name: Rock Quarry
properties.description: Posted by MbeecrofLike many other people our age, we found the rock quarry back here to be a lovely spot for cliff jumping and swimming. Unlike the rest of the people our age, we had known about this place for a long time and held it with great sentimental value.

properties.name: Rope Swing
properties.description: Posted by MbeecrofHere lies the famous rope swing hanging over the river. Many of my friends come here not only to swing and swim but to simply talk with one another while enjoying the beauty of the river and the woods.

properties.name: Scary House
properties.description: Posted by MbeecrofAn abandoned house my friends and I would go to at night and try to scare eachother at. We once made a cheesy amateur horror video at this location.

properties.name: The Brentwood Starbucks
properties.description: Posted by MbeecrofThis place is the worst place ever, yet you could have found me there probably every day. Our friends would repeatedly decide that this was the best place to meet up and then choose what we were going to do after. Except we would always end up staying there for hours upon hours and never do anything.

properties.name: The Cocoa Tree
properties.description: Posted by MbeecrofA chocolate store where our friend Ashley worked. We\'d come see her here often in the hopes of getting normally expensive chocolate for free.
